withI9.title: Employee documents
withI9.description: During onboarding, employees will sign these documents.

documents.directDeposit: Direct deposit authorization - Lets you pay the employee via direct deposit

included.title: Verifying Form I-9 is remedial
included.description: You need to complete the verification process online within 3 days of the employee starting work. If you fail to verify the employee within the required time, you will need to complete and sign the form manually (and Texas need to complete and sign Form I-9 separately).

notIncluded.title: Have you completed the form I-9 already?
notIncluded.description: If you select Form I-9 above, we will send Form I-9 to verify remotely. Otherwise, you will need to complete Form I-9 separately.

notSelfOnboarding.title: Employee documents
notSelfOnboarding.description: You will sign all these forms for your employee manually.

requirements.employmentEligibilityDescription: Verifies the employee's identity and work eligibility (must be completed on/by).
requirements.directDepositDescription: Lets you pay the employee via direct deposit

alert.title: The government requires you to have Form I-9 and Form W-2 completed and signed.
